mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group of visitors at Home of Washington, Mount Vernon, Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Luke Dillon, Photographer, Washington D. C. Office 935 Penn. Avenue, Pullman's Gallery
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Group of visitors posed on the southeast lawn in front of the Mansion, 1884-1894. View includes the southeast corner of the Mansion including the colonnade, south porch, and balustrade. Photograph taken by 'official photographer to the Association' Luke C. Dillon. Reverse of the photographs indicates the picture was taken 'Oct 19 - 4 (group 4)."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Visitors
